revised_title: Nervous Anatomy and Organization in Nereid Polychaetes
tldr: This article examines the nervous anatomy and organization of nereid polychaetes, focusing on the structure of their nerve cords, peripheral nerves, and the role of giant-fibres and fine-fibres in their nervous system. The study also discusses the motor innervation of the body segments and the coordination of body flexures and parapodial movements.
